nl.naturalis.lims2.oaipmh

Class ListRecordsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.lims2.oaipmh.ListRecordsHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DnaExtractListRecordsHandler, DnaExtractPlateListRecordsHandler, SpecimenListRecordsHandler

    public abstract class ListRecordsHandler
extends Object
    Abstract base class for handlers for the ListRecords protocol request.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

      • getAnnotatedDocumentPreFilters

        protected abstract List<IAnnotatedDocumentPreFilter> getAnnotatedDocumentPreFilters()
        Template method to be implemented by concrete subclasses: provide extra pre-filters for the particular resource to subclass deals with. The extra pre-filters are applied after the SharedPreFilter.

      • getAnnotatedDocumentPostFilters

        protected abstract List<IAnnotatedDocumentPostFilter> getAnnotatedDocumentPostFilters()
        Template method to be implemented by concrete subclasses: provide extra post-filters for the particular resource to subclass deals with. The extra post-filters are applied after the SharedPostFilter.

      • setMetadata

        protected abstract void setMetadata(Geneious geneious,
                                    AnnotatedDocument ad)
        Template method to be implemented by concrete subclasses: provide the child element of the <geneious> element.
        Parameters:

        ad -

      • getPageSize

        protected abstract int getPageSize()
        Template method to be implemented by concrete subclasses: return the page size (number of records per request) for the particular resource to subclass deals with.
        Returns:

      • getSQLQuery

        protected String getSQLQuery()
        Returns the database query retrieving the initial set of records (before any programmatical filtering). Could be overrided by subclasses should the need arise. The default implementation sorts records by their database ID in descending order.
        Returns:
